title: Orion Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, International, Organic, Thai, Western, Juice bar
description: Set in a quiet bay, this vegetarian cafe is located inside Orion Healing Center. Offers pre- and post- detox food, including vegan, raw food, superfoods, sattvic-yogic food prepared according to Ayurveda, Japanese and Thai cuisines. Uses organic as much as possible from its own garden or local markets. For cooking, the kitchen uses house-made ghee or rice bran oi. Has raw food options and raw desserts.
